pullRequest.title: feat: new run config to recreate the most recently launched game auto…
pullRequest.bodyText:
Contains
Fixes #4061
How to test
Run the "recreate latest" configuration
Outstanding before merging
Should probably add comments/javadoc for these configurations. (load lastest and create latest)

commit.message: feat: new run config to recreate the most recently launched game automatically

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+<component name="ProjectRunConfigurationManager">
+  <configuration default="false" name="TerasologyPC (recreate latest)" type="Application" factoryName="Application">
+    <option name="MAIN_CLASS_NAME" value="org.terasology.engine.Terasology" />
+    <module name="Terasology.facades.PC.main" />
+    <option name="PROGRAM_PARAMETERS" value="-homedir -noCrashReport -createlastgame" />
+    <shortenClasspath name="MANIFEST" />
+    <option name="VM_PARAMETERS" value="-Xms256m -Xmx1536m" />
+    <method v="2">
+      <option name="Make" enabled="true" />
+    </method>
+  </configuration>
+</component>

nodes.bodyText: these last two methods help find the last integer at the end of the title of the last game.
